title: It’s Time to Let Go of These Stocks
text:
This weekend, my two dearest friends are sending their sons off to college for the first time. Both young men are well-equipped to handle the change: They’re affable, hard-working, and bright. No matter how difficult, it’s time to let go. (I’ll have to remember that when I’m in my friends' shoes a few years from now!)

In honor of those parents packing up their sons and daughters for college--and in honor of the kids, too--we’re dedicating this week’s column to solid companies that it’s time to let go of.
description: These 15 wide- and narrow-moat names are significantly overvalued by our measures.
